entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
